definition: major turning point of lifelong import (esp. marriage)
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I know I'm a in the neck. I just want you to be happy.
sentences.chinese: 我知道我很啰唆，可是这是妳的终身大事。

sentences.english: Finally, you've got to marry the person you love with your whole heart.
sentences.chinese: 终身大事，只能找个你全心全意爱的人。

sentences.english: Please accept my best wishes for a long and happy married life.
sentences.chinese: 请接受我对你们的终身大事所表示的最衷心的祝贺。

sentences.english: To the tide that marriage is marriage, to come in to think clearly.
sentences.chinese: 向潮认为结婚是终身大事，要成双考虑清楚。

sentences.english: Event of lifelong significance, usually refers to marriage.
sentences.chinese: 这可是他的终身大事，不可儿戏。

sentences.english: In addition, there are many couples who are rushing to get married during the holiday.
sentences.chinese: 另外尚有许多新人在长假期间赶著完成终身大事。

definition: to get married and have kids/to start a family
to settle down and get married (of a man)/to become a recognized expert
young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried
to act as go-between (between prospective marriage partners etc)
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
to take a wife/to get married (man)
